publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3040 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Criminal Record Checks for Students-That the Parliament supports the Association of Scottish Colleges (ASC) in its condemnation of Scottish Executive proposals to impose charges for criminal record checks for students; notes that such checks would be in respect of courses involving work placements with children and vulnerable adults; supports the view that the charges will impact most negatively on students who are unemployed or from disadvantaged backgrounds; recognises the ASC's concerns that the inclusion of students in such a regime could lead to a decline in the availability of people suitable and properly qualified for working with children and vulnerable adults, and suggests that, in order to avoid such a decline, the charges should remain, as they are at present, free
